channel.title: CVE Feed for Japan Total System Co.,Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Japan Total System Co.,Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20875|2024-08-03T17:53:23.086Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession%20free%20edition%2C%20groupsession%20bycloud%2C%20groupsession%20zion
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in GroupSession Free edition ver5.1.1 and earlier, GroupSession byCloud ver5.1.1 and earlier, and GroupSession ZION ver5.1.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks by having a user to access a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-20787|2024-08-03T17:53:22.442Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in GroupSession (GroupSession Free edition from ver2.2.0 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, GroupSession byCloud from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, and GroupSession ZION from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0) allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script by sending a specially crafted request to a specific URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-20874|2024-08-03T17:53:23.075Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession%20free%20edition%2C%20groupsession%20bycloud%2C%20groupsession%20zion
item.description: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource vulnerability in GroupSession Free edition ver5.1.1 and earlier, GroupSession byCloud ver5.1.1 and earlier, and GroupSession ZION ver5.1.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access arbitrary files on the server and obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20788|2024-08-03T17:53:22.474Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in GroupSession (GroupSession Free edition from ver2.2.0 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, GroupSession byCloud from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, and GroupSession ZION from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0) allows a remote authenticated attacker to conduct a port scan from the product and/or obtain information from the internal Web server.

item.title: CVE-2021-20789|2024-08-03T17:53:22.634Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in GroupSession (GroupSession Free edition from ver2.2.0 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, GroupSession byCloud from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, and GroupSession ZION from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0) allows a remote attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web site and conduct a phishing attack via a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-20785|2024-08-03T17:53:22.640Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in GroupSession (GroupSession Free edition from ver2.2.0 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, GroupSession byCloud from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, and GroupSession ZION from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0) allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script by sending a specially crafted request to a specific URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-20786|2024-08-03T17:53:22.490Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in GroupSession (GroupSession Free edition from ver2.2.0 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, GroupSession byCloud from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0, and GroupSession ZION from ver3.0.3 to the version prior to ver5.1.0) allows a remote attacker to hijack the authentication of administrators via a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2021-20876|2024-08-03T17:53:23.073Z -- japan%20total%20system%20co.%2Cltd. -- groupsession%20free%20edition%2C%20groupsession%20bycloud%2C%20groupsession%20zion
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in GroupSession Free edition ver5.1.1 and earlier, GroupSession byCloud ver5.1.1 and earlier, and GroupSession ZION ver5.1.1 and earlier allows an attacker with an administrative privilege to obtain sensitive information stored in the hierarchy above the directory on the published site's server via unspecified vectors.
